name: Victor Tim's Mansion
description:
Victor Tim's Mansion is a Agatha Christie inspired, murder mystery, whodunnit puzzle-adventure game.

A renowned surgeon Victor Tim was found dead in his own house. The police have found eight suspects, but it’s up to YOU to find the killer. 

Walk with WASD around Victor Tim’s mansion to find clues and learn who murdered Victor Tim. Click Tab to open the Accusation Menu and accuse (with Left Mouse Click) or cross off (with Right Mouse Click) suspects who in your opinion could not have done that.

The game was made in Unity by Tad M. Rad.
